brief: A SaaS CRM platform for managing customer interactions with real-time notifications and chat features, expected to handle 10,000 users in the first year, built by a JavaScript-focused team.
A CRM tool for sales teams with integrated email and calendar sync, requiring real-time updates for a growing user base.
An online marketplace for freelance services with secure payment processing and user reviews.
A peer-to-peer marketplace for renting equipment, including payment integration and location-based search.
A simple blog website for a startup to share company news and updates, with a tight 2-week launch deadline.
A brochure site for a consulting firm, showcasing services and team, needing quick deployment.
A social media app for sharing photos and videos, with heavy media upload and streaming capabilities.
A video sharing platform for educational content, requiring CDN for global distribution.
An internal dashboard for tracking employee performance and project metrics in a small organization.
A tool for managing inventory and orders for a retail business, with simple UI and database.
A progressive web app for tracking fitness goals, with offline functionality and mobile-first design.
A PWA for a news aggregator, allowing offline reading and push notifications.
A collaborative document editor with real-time editing and comments, similar to Google Docs.
A project management tool with real-time task updates and team chat.
An e-commerce site for selling handmade jewelry, with inventory management and payment processing.
An online store for digital products like ebooks and courses, integrated with Shopify.
A platform for building and deploying AI chatbots, with vector database for knowledge retrieval.
An AI-powered assistant for customer support, using Mastra for agentic workflows.
A data visualization dashboard for analyzing sales data from multiple sources.
An ETL pipeline for processing and visualizing big data from user logs.
A real-time chat application for customer support in a CRM system.
A marketplace for buying and selling used cars with escrow payments.
A personal blog for a developer to share tutorials and code snippets.
A media gallery for photographers to showcase portfolios with high-res images.
A mobile app for expense tracking with offline sync.
